long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Neat is a new tab extension that we designed combining all features a focused and dedicated worker needs. 

This extension will add a new look to your new tab page, meaning it will be overtaken and customized. Your new glance will be neat and straightforward. No side distractions, no excessive features, just what you need. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to installing the Neat Tab extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ default search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your search engine to be powered by Bing.

Neat will create a perfect working space for you. Aside from the functionalities, Neat also has the looks. Tidied platform with minimal details and a futuristic look is ideal for any work that requires a computer or similar device. Whether you are a student, working in the IT industry, or using the computer as a tool to facilitate work Neat will have you covered.
